attributes.action: Stop Plans for Charging for congestion when all of our towns are being held up with speed humps and road blocks the government fitted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all we ever here is the government wants to tax motorists for congestion. when all we ever do is sit at road blocks put there by them. Bring back common sense and stop causing obstructions for the motorist, and let the traffic flow freely. also make local councils liable for repairs to our vehicles caused by excessive wear due to road humps.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
